staxel.village.dialogue.MushroomGirl.lin: Fascinating!
I've never seen such an agile mushroom before!
Do you speak?
Nod
Shake head
Oh? How odd! It seems you at least understand what I'm saying.
That does rather bring into question your authenticity, however...
Do you mind if I take a closer look?
Hmm, yes... Fascinating!
How do your motor functions work? What, exactly is this?
Eh?! What?
Well.
That was somewhat cruel of you...
Though I suppose you must be a fellow mushroom-lover to have gone to such lengths.
Perhaps I can consider forgiving you...
I suppose I did ruin your costume...somehow?
Maybe this would serve as sufficient compensation?
I suppose we could talk a bit more about mushrooms sometime if you like?
Ah, if it isn't the 'mushroom'...
How can I help you today?
Hm? ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; told you I was in trouble and needed help?
I'll have you know I happen to like it this way!
I didn't grow these for no reason!
Mushrooms have very many useful properties and this island could certainly use some more.
So if you wouldn't mind, perhaps you could return to ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; and clarify things for her?
Still here?
I'd appreciate it if you could go talk to ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; about this for me!
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...?
What happened?
For a moment, I felt as though I had become one with the mushrooms!
Oh, but you cannot imagine how glorious it was!
But...why has it suddenly become so easy to breathe?
Where did all my pets disappear to?
You didn't have anything to do with this, did you?
Hello, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
You know, regardless of what you did last time, I'm sure you actually like mushrooms almost as much as I do...
Why else would you have approached me in their guise the first time?
For this reason, I have a bit of a favour to ask you...
There's a very special place I want to show you. Somewhere few people can venture.
Just let me know when you're ready to go.
I'm ready.
Not yet.
Good! Then let's be off
This is my world, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...
A special place that belongs to no one else.
It's why I let ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; convince me to come to the village in the first place.
But it's dying, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...
The mycelium beneath the village is dying and soon there won't be any mushrooms left at all...
We can still save it though! That's where you come in.
There should be two very special ^c:d03e37;mushrooms^c:pop; in this realm.
If you can get hold of their seeds and plant them in the village, we just might be able to do something!
They shouldn't be hard to find, but they might be difficult to reach...
One lies ^c:1486b0;deep beneath the ground^c:pop; and the other ^c:1486b0;high in the skies above^c:pop;.
Once you have them, plant them in the village. One of each should be enough.
Don't pick them though! We need them live and growing!
If you find yourself back in the village, the ^c:d03e37;large mushroom^c:pop; in my house should transport you here.
I know I'm asking a lot, but good luck, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
Time is not unlimited, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...
Find and plant the two types of ^c:d03e37;mushroom seeds^c:pop;! Don't pick them though!
One lies ^c:1486b0;deep beneath the ground^c:pop; and the other ^c:1486b0;high in the skies above^c:pop;.
The ^c:d03e37;Giant Mushroom^c:pop; can get you back if need be.
You did it, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
The mycelium is stabilising again!
I knew you liked mushrooms just as much as I do!
This is just a little something...
Think of it as thanks not just for this time, but the times you've helped me in the past too!
I know I haven't been the most welcoming of people...
But if you ever feel like you want to spice up your home with more mushrooms...
You know where to find me!
